user.title: Connect to Contact Energy
user.description: Enter your Contact Energy account details below. Email and password are for your Contact Energy account login. Usage days determines how much historical data to fetch (1-365 days). Large ranges will download in background. Auto-restart improves reliability and speed by restarting daily at 3 AM.

data.usage_days: Fetch data for the past X days (1-365)
data.enable_auto_restart: Enable automatic restart (recommended for faster data downloads)

data_description.email: Your Contact Energy account email address
data_description.usage_days: Number of days of historical usage data to fetch (1-365). Larger ranges will download in the background.
data_description.enable_auto_restart: Automatically restarts the integration daily to improve data download reliability and speed. This can help resolve temporary connection issues and ensure fresh data is retrieved.

restart_time.title: Configure Restart Time
restart_time.description: Set the time when the integration will restart daily. Choose a time when you're typically not using Home Assistant.

data_description.restart_time: Time when the integration will restart daily (24-hour format). The restart only affects this integration, not your entire Home Assistant system.
